title: How to write a portfolio statement - Quora

response.answer_text: Writing a portfolio statement relates to the what are the investments I made? The investments which I make and the profit or loss that occur, that I mention in my portfolio statement. Being an intra-day trader, I am prefer to square up my position on the same day only either I there is profit or loss. With this, I maintain my portfolio having the all the prices at which I bought or sold some volume of stock. So, that it help me to not to do the same mistake as done earlier while buying or selling of shares. Thank you..
